dict.string: Thea needs microphone access for voice activation ("Hey Thea").
Thea uses speech recognition for voice commands.
Thea needs access to play voice responses.
Thea tracks your health data to provide personalized insights and life coaching recommendations.
Thea updates your health data based on your tracked activities and goals.
Thea tracks your location to understand your daily routines and provide context-aware assistance.
Thea tracks your location in the background to provide comprehensive life coaching insights.
Thea tracks your movement patterns to understand your activity levels and provide fitness insights.
Thea needs accessibility access to track input activity for productivity insights. Your data never leaves your device.
